trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Augusta
There were no other sightings in Augusta on or around July 24th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsThe objects moved around in the sky forming several different shapes including a triangle, then L shape, then all bunching together. these all turned different colors as well such as orange, yellow, and white. Could tell these were NOT stars because of the size. at one point it compared to the moon. Saw at nighttime. There was three different main spots in the sky that the objects appeared. Did not make a sound.
